# v0.1.7

This release syncs the GitHub release version with npm package versions.

## Changes since v0.1.1

The following changes were published to npm incrementally and are now consolidated in this release:

- Package version bumps for `@speclife/core`, `@speclife/cli`, and `@speclife/mcp-server`
- Root package.json version synced to match sub-packages

**Full Changelog**: https://github.com/malarbase/speclife/compare/v0.1.1...v0.1.7
